last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 3
last_episode_to_air.overview: The pressure to win another title is mounting. Max's mother reveals both the personal price she paid for her son to fulfill his potential and the source of his incredible resilience.

name: Max Verstappen: Anatomy of a Champion
original_name: Max Verstappen: Anatomy of a Champion
overview: This three-part series offers viewers a unique look at the life of a young racing prodigy, following Max Verstappen as he trains and competes at the highest level of world sport. Focusing on Verstappen’s World Championship-winning 2022 season while looking back at his childhood, the series also delves into Verstappen’s intense relationship with his father, Jos Verstappen.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: In 2021 the Formula 1 season was exciting until the end. It was not an overnight success: as the son of two talented drivers, Max learned early on that only the boldest drivers win.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: On his way to the Belgian Grand Prix, Max returns to the city where he grew up. Max and his family relive the powerful story of his childhood, and the origins of his bond with his father Jos.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: The pressure to win another title is mounting. Max's mother reveals both the personal price she paid for her son to fulfill his potential and the source of his incredible resilience.
